attributes.additional_details: people that get up off their backsides and go to work should at the very least, be given their dignity back by being able to earn enough to support their family and to fully take part in society. government must make plans to reward those that work by gradually introducing a living wage over the next decade, this will not only be good for people,s moral and give hard working people their self respect back this would also be good for the economy as a hole....
